product_name: Mountain Hardwear Super Chockstone Jacket - Men's
long_description: You can squeeze through tight cracks in the rugged Mountain Hardwear Super Chockstone Jacket for men. This stretchy hooded soft shell is water resistant, lightweight and built for a beating.
